dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 8332 IH: Elimination of the VA Asset and Infrastructure Review (AIR) Commission Act of 2022
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Golden (for himself and Mr. McKinley) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs, and in addition to the Committee on Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To repeal the VA Asset and Infrastructure Review Act of 2018.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Elimination of the VA Asset and Infrastructure Review (AIR) Commission Act of 2022.

section.header: Elimination of Asset and Infrastructure Review Commission of Department of Veterans Affairs
section.text: The VA Asset and Infrastructure Review Act of 2018 (subtitle A of title II of Public Law 115â€“182; 38 U.S.C. 8122 note) is repealed.
